experience.description:
Full recruiting circle:
• Searching, screening, interviewing, testing (soft and hard
skills, foreign languages)
• Writing and posting job descriptions;
• Advertising jobs on the Internet, Social media, professional websites and channels (LinkedIn, Facebook, Habr, hh.ru)
• Checking references;
• Coordinate the whole process of candidate-client
communication.

My main range of positions: Chief Accountant, Finance Analyst, Procurement Specialist,Logistic Managers, Chief Engineers, Operation Director etc.
